title: The Genie from downunder. - Vol. 3.
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Patricia Edgar, Phil Jones, Brendan Maher and Esben Storm
brief_description: From the producers of “Round the twist” and “Skytrackers”, two more episodes in the adventures of Penelope Townes and the two genies she found in an opal - Bruce and his son Baz - “Larceny”’ and “The Eternal quadrangle.”
